events.message: The claimant reported a vehicle collision that occurred last night involving two cars at the intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident, as the incident involves a car collision on a public road.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to handle this case for further processing.
The claimant was notified that their auto accident claim has been formally acknowledged and is under review.
We have requested police reports, vehicle damage photos, and medical bills from the claimant to support their auto accident claim.
The claimant submitted all required documents including the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates.
Our investigation into the auto accident claim began, reviewing submitted evidence and verifying details with the authorities.
Investigation was completed confirming fault and validating the damages to the vehicle as reported by the claimant.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and related expenses was proposed to the claimant following the investigation.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and thanked the agent for efficient processing.
Approval was granted for the claim and the agreed settlement will be disbursed promptly to cover all verified losses.
The settlement payment was issued and transferred to the claimant's account as per the approved claim agreement.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful payment and claimant confirmation of resolution.
All claim documentation and correspondence have been archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference.
